Headline: #125 Water Tower Express Temporary Reroute near State/Illinois
ShortDescription: 125 Water Tower Exp. buses rrted EB: Orleans, Chicago, Mies Van Der Rohe, & Chestnut; WB: Michigan, Chicago, & Wells due to, street blockage nr State/Illinois.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#125 Water Tower Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near State/Illinois.

Eastbound buses will operate via Orleans, Chicago, Mies Van Der Rohe, and Chestnut.

Westbound buses will operate via Michigan, Chicago, and Wells.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute near State/Illinois
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses rrted EB: Illinois, LaSalle, Chgo, Fairbanks, & Illinois; WB: Grand, Fairbanks, Chgo, LaSalle, & Grand due to street blockage nr State/Illinois.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near State/Illinois.

Eastbound buses will operate via Illinois, LaSalle, Chicago, Fairbanks, and Illinois.

Westbound buses will operate via Grand, Fairbanks, Chicago, LaSalle, and Grand.

Allow extra travel time.
